Summary: i saw multiple moving object move across the sky most where a yellow green or orange colour pulsing
trends: There have been no other sightings in Scunthorpe
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsToday on the first of jan 2010 i saw multiple moving object move across the sky most where a yellow green or orange colour pulsing i was closing my window, that i could see moving some where far away like the size of a plane light but they where lower to the ground then what a plane flights at some looked like they where spinning some u could make out abit of a shape all the lights where different sizes i first saw them at 00:15 there where many then it many have been happening before that it is now 00:42 an every so often u can see them this is not the first time i have noticed them when i was walking home with my mates some time in augest we noticed 3 moving across the sky but thought nothing of it these thing are very stranged i tryed to to a vid on my phone what i have but its not that good u can see the lights and they are moving as i was taking one of the vids a noise started to come from my phone like what i can here though my headset on my computer when i send a text my phone was fully charged and then it just cut out this happened when i was filming on of the closer objects i the turned it on and it was full still i am not crazy i did see it so did my sister i wouldnt lie about this.i am now righting this when i first saw them i rembered i hade seen them before. i was feeling intrested wanting to know what they where i lost sight cause they moved.i have a vid but cant attach to this.
